meteringrange: 0 to 20 EV (3D color matrix or center-weighted metering) 0 to 20 EV (spot metering)
exposurebracketing: 2 or 3 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1 or 2 EV
exposurecompensation: ±5 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV in P, S, A, and M modes
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing AE-L/AF-L button Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF)
detectionrange: -1 to 19 EV (ISO 100, 68°F/20°C) Lens Servo Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); Continuous-servo AF (AF-C); auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A); predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status Manual focus (MF): Electronic rangefinder can be used
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit such as SB-910, SB-900, SB-400, SB-80DX, SB-28DX or SB-50DX is fully charged
compatiblelenses: AF NIKKOR lenses, including type G and D lenses (some restrictions apply to PC lenses) and DX lenses (using DX 24 × 16 1.5x image area), AI-P NIKKOR lenses, and non-CPU AI lenses (A and M modes only). IX NIKKOR lenses, lenses for the F3AF, and non-AI lenses cannot be used.
expandedisosensitivityoptions: Hi-1 (ISO-12,800 equivalent) in 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV Hi-2, (ISO-25,600 equivalent) 1 EV
liveviewshooting: Photography Live View Mode Movie Live View Mode
picturecontrolsystem: Landscape Monochrome Neutral Portrait Standard User-customizable Settings Vivid
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 2,016-pixel RGB sensor are available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-700, SB-400 or SB-300; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighting metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
autofocussystem: Nikon Multi-CAM 4800 autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection
focusmodes: Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) Continuous-servo (AF-C) Face-Priority AF available in Live View only and D-Movie only Manual (M) with electronic rangefinder Normal area Single-servo AF (AF-S) Wide area
interface: Accessory Terminal: Remote Cord: MC-DC2 (available separately); GPS unit: GP-1 (available separately) HDMI output: Type C mini-pin HDMI connector Headphone Connector Hi-speed USB Stereo Microphone Input
flashbracketing: 2 to 3 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1 or 2 EV
imagesensor: CMOS sensor, 35.9mm x 24.0mm, Nikon FX format
fileformat: JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant; can be selected from Size Priority and Optimal Quality JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant with fine (approx 1:4), Normal (approx 1:8) or Basic (approx 1:16) Compression NEF (RAW): Lossless Compressed, Compressed or Uncompressed 12 or 14 bit TIFF (RGB)
releasemodes: Continuous low-speed [CL] mode; 1-5 frames per second Continuous high-speed [CH] mode; 5.5 frames per second Mirror-up [Mup] mode Quiet Shutter Release Self-timer mode Single-frame [S] mode
afareamode: 9, 21 or 39 point Dynamic-area AF Auto-area AF Single-point AF 3D-tracking (39 points)
incameraimageediting: Color Balance Color Outline Color Sketch D-Lighting Distortion Control Edit Movie Filter Effects Fisheye Image Overlay Miniature Effect Monochrome NEF (RAW) Processing Perspective Control Quick Retouch Red-Eye Correction Resize Selective Color Side-by-Side Comparison Straighten Trim
gps: GP-1 GPS unit GP-1A GPS unit
liveviewafareamode: Face-priority AF Wide-area AF Normal-area AF Subject-tracking AF
wififunctionality: Eye-Fi Compatible WU-1b Wireless Mobile Adapter
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VIII with AF Area Brackets (grid lines can be displayed)
storagemedia: SD SDHC SDXC Card Slots: 2 Secure Digital (SD)
supportedlanguages: Arabic Brazilian Portuguese Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Norweigan Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Spanish Swedish Thai Turkish Ukrainian
movieaudio: Built-in microphone, monaural External stereo microphone (optional)
continuousshootingoptions: FX-format CH: Up to 6 frames per second CL: Up to 1-5 frames per second
liveviewautofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected)
flashsyncspeed: Up to 1/200 sec. Synchronizes with shutter at 1/250s or slower
playbackfunctions: Auto Image Rotation Full-Frame and Thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) Highlights Histogram Display Image Comment Movie Playback Movie Slideshow Playback with Zoom Slideshow
moviemaximumrecordingtime: 20 minutes at highest quality 29 minutes 59 seconds at normal quality
approxdimensions: Width: 5.6 in. (141mm) Height: 4.4 in. (113mm) Depth: 3.2 in. (82mm)
monitoradjustments: Brightness, 5 levels Brightness control using ambient brightness sensor
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV
meteringsystem: Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 8mm circle in center of frame Matrix: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses) Spot: Meters 4mm circle (about 1.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
activedlighting: Auto Extra High High Normal Low Off
moviemetering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
viewfinderframecoverage: FX (36x24): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical Approx. DX (24x16): 97% Horizontal and 97% Vertical Approx.
flashsyncmodes: Front-curtain sync (normal) Rear-curtain sync Red-Eye reduction Red-Eye reduction with slow sync Slow sync
acadapter: EH-5b AC Adapter Requires EP-5B Power Supply Connector
exposuremodes: Aperture-Priority (A) Manual (M) Programmed auto with flexible program (P) Shutter-Priority (S)
dlightingbracketing: D-Lighting Bracketing 2 frames using selected value for one frame 3-5 frames using preset values for all frames
filesystem: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) PictBridge
whitebalance: Auto Choose color temperature (2500K-10000K) Cloudy Direct Sunlight Flash Fluorescent (7 types) Incandescent Preset manual (up to 4 values can be stored) Shade
